graph.original_query: I want to buy a Mahindra Car, help me understand what are the recent launches, recommend a latest vehichle. I want to know the details on the features for your recommended vehicle. Format the report in the HTML and CSS theme from this website: https://groww.in/

nodes.description: Fetch the entire HTML content and associated CSS files from the provided URL (https://groww.in/) to analyze its structure and styling.
nodes.agent_prompt: Retrieve the complete HTML source code, external CSS file links, and inline CSS styles from the webpage located at https://groww.in/. Provide the raw HTML content and a list of all identified CSS URLs.

nodes.description: Analyze the HTML and CSS content from T001 to identify the core design principles, color palette, font styles, layout structure, and common UI component styling (e.g., headers, footers, cards, buttons) to create a comprehensive style guide for HTML report generation.
nodes.agent_prompt: Based on the raw HTML and CSS outputs from previous step, distill a detailed style guide. This guide should include: primary, secondary, and accent colors (with hex codes), font families and sizes used for headings and body text, typical spacing and padding conventions, common responsive design breakpoints, and styling examples for structural elements like containers, cards, and text blocks. Also, provide a general HTML structural template based on the site's common page layouts.

nodes.description: Perform an exhaustive search for all Mahindra car launches within the last 12-24 months. Collect details such as model name, launch date, target segment, and initial high-level features.
nodes.agent_prompt: Research and provide a comprehensive list of all Mahindra car models launched in the past 12-24 months. For each model, include its official name, approximate launch date, intended market segment, and 2-3 key distinguishing features or selling points.

nodes.description: Analyze the list of recent launches from T003 and recommend the single 'latest' or most relevant vehicle that aligns with general consumer interest for a new car purchase. Provide a clear justification for the recommendation.
nodes.agent_prompt: Review the list of recent Mahindra launches. Identify and recommend one single vehicle that can be considered the 'latest' or most noteworthy for a general consumer considering a new car purchase. Explain the rationale for your choice, considering factors like launch recency, market positioning, and general appeal. State the recommended vehicle's name clearly.

nodes.description: Gather comprehensive and granular details on the features and specifications of the specific recommended Mahindra vehicle identified in T004. This includes engine specifications, safety features, infotainment, comfort, dimensions, variants, and pricing range.
nodes.agent_prompt: For the recommended Mahindra vehicle, conduct an exhaustive search to collect its detailed features and specifications. Include information on engine variants (type, displacement, power, torque), transmission options, fuel economy, comprehensive list of safety features (e.g., airbags, ABS, EBD, ESP, ADAS), infotainment system details (screen size, connectivity), interior comfort and convenience features, exterior dimensions, available variants, and approximate ex-showroom pricing range.

nodes.description: Synthesize the overview of recent Mahindra launches from T003 and the detailed features of the recommended vehicle from T005 into a structured, coherent content brief suitable for generating a comprehensive report. The brief should logically flow from general context to specific recommendation and details.
nodes.agent_prompt: Combine the summary of recent Mahindra car launches from the 'T003' output with the detailed features and specifications of the recommended vehicle from 'T005' output. Structure this information into a cohesive, executive-grade content brief. The brief should include an introductory section on recent launches, clearly state the recommended vehicle with justification, and then provide a thoroughly detailed section on its features, organized into logical categories (e.g., performance, safety, comfort, technology). Ensure the output is ready for direct use in report generation.

nodes.description: Generate the final report in HTML format, incorporating the content synthesized in T006 and strictly adhering to the CSS styling guidelines and HTML structural patterns identified in T002 to replicate the visual theme of groww.in.
nodes.agent_prompt: Using the detailed content brief from 'T006' and the comprehensive style guide including HTML structural patterns from 'T002', generate a complete HTML report. The HTML must precisely implement the visual theme of groww.in, including its color palette, typography, spacing, and component styling. Ensure the report is well-structured, responsive, and aesthetically consistent with the groww.in website. Provide the full HTML code including embedded CSS, if necessary, or links to external CSS that mimics the provided style.
